snippet.title: Game & Watch/Micro Vs. System: Donkey Kong 3 (1984 Nintendo)
snippet.description:
Emulation: MAME (Compiled before 0.222)
Game Artwork: DarthMarino (Link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1r2_t_Vp92xK2egnMZ_gPMmktL_52_zH6/view)
(Also playable on Game & Watch Gallery 4)
You are Stanley and are trying to fight off bees to defend your garden, while forcing them towards Donkey Kong on the left. If a bee reaches Donkey Kong's side, you earn 10 points, no misses are earned. But if a bee reaches your side, you get a miss. Game B is a 2 player game. Both players start with a score of 50:50. If a bee enters a garden on either side, the points are subtracted from that side. If a bee reaches either Stanley or Donkey Kong, they get a miss. They also get a miss if their side's score reaches 0. The game is over regardless if either Donkey Kong or Stanley have 3 misses.
